config.question: Although on the surface the Scopes trial was about the teaching of evolution in schools, on a deeper level the trial was a contest between __________.

choices.content: regulatory controls and laissez-faire economic theory
northern, urban Democrats and southern, rural Democrats
the opposing sides in the national women’s suffrage debate

answer_3.response: Also called the “monkey trial,” the 1924 Scopes trial was a contest between modern liberalism and religious fundamentalism. The trial court convicted John Scopes, affirming the fundamentalist view, but the spectacle drew the derision of many Americans who saw nothing threatening about Darwin’s theory.
